attributes.action: Abolish the staged national minimum wage, and have one minimum wage for all ages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is age discrimination, so employers cannot chose someone based upon their age, yet they can pay people different amounts for doing the same work?

Surely this is contradictory!

There should be one minimum wage for all people in employment aged 16+, and that should be at current the £5.52 minimum wage for adults.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
